item.title: Bins overflowing, 7th September
item.description:
Bins at bus stops on both sides of the roads are overflowing. This is constantly an issue and the bins aren't emptied frequently enough.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southend Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping in Brewhouse Road, 7th September
item.description:
Chinese lady from 25 Brewhouse Road does not know how to manage her waste. Flytipped this fan, which was initially by her bins then she decided to dump it near the pathway where people walk.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brewhouse Road, Charlton Riverside, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Safety barriers and gate are not being closed, 7th September

item.title: Over flowing bins, 7th September
item.description:
Our shared big bins have been replaced with 8 small bins, people aren’t using them and it is causing a file of rubbish to have formed. This is an urgent issues as we don’t want to attract rats etc. please can large bins be returned and the mess cleaned .

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bins and littering, 7th September
item.description:
Our two big shared bins were replaced with 8 small wheelie bins. People aren’t putting the rubbish in the bins and instead just throwing it on the floor. We need this to be removed and cleared as it’s food waste and will cause pests.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Farleigh Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
